message:
Very nice and useful example. I added Stopwatch timing to compare speed. Results:

Default:  
47616 ticks (ser)  
517 bytes  
3169 ticks (de)

Default (compressed):  
2397 ticks (ser)  
317 bytes  
267 ticks (de)

Default (serializable):  
2686 ticks (ser)  
691 bytes  
2293 ticks (de)

Default (serializable, compressed):  
285 ticks (ser)  
343 bytes  
168 ticks (de)

Binary:  
144 ticks (ser)  
321 bytes  
348 ticks (de)

Binary (compressed):  
479 ticks (ser)  
233 bytes  
186 ticks (de)

JSON:  
241801 ticks (ser)  
185 bytes  
108606 ticks (de)

JSON (compressed):  
447 ticks (ser)  
142 bytes  
659 ticks (de)

BSON:  
18804 ticks (ser)  
193 bytes  
13461 ticks (de)

BSON (compressed):  
377 ticks (ser)  
153 bytes  
124 ticks (de)
